change_policy: All changes must be versioned, dated, and documented. Historical interpretations may not be retroactively altered without explicit version migration.
lock_conditions: Set locked=true once tiers are publicly finalized. Any future changes require schema_version increment and migration notes.

change_log.description: First canonical, versioned definition of Clock Status Tiers with locked labels and descriptions.
Added explicit minute bins (min_minutes/max_minutes) to enable deterministic tier mapping from clock minutes past noon.

tiers.label: Democratic Strength
tiers.description: Institutions function as intended; failures are isolated and correctable.

tiers.label: Democratic Stress
tiers.description: Rising institutional strain; norms weakening but still resilient.

tiers.label: Democratic Erosion
tiers.description: Structural damage accumulating; repair requires active intervention.

tiers.label: Democratic Fragility
tiers.description: Authoritarian traits systemically present; outcomes increasingly distorted.

tiers.label: Democratic Breakdown
tiers.description: Systemic failures; elections, courts, or rights no longer reliably constrain power.

tiers.label: Democratic Collapse
tiers.description: Power no longer accountable; self-government functionally absent.
